Brand: Roar Carbon
Price: $$14.99 
Key Features: 
  - Real Carbon Fiber
  - Made in USA
  - 5 year warranty against delamination
  - Holds Cash and Cards

0.32 ounces (View shipping rates and policies)

 [/INST] Small, but very powerful, this money clip holds an average of $20.00 in cash and up to 15 credit cards. This accessory is made of 100% US-grown Torrey Pine Carbon Fiber and treated with a process called thermoset, making it extremely strong and durable. It is constructed with a titanium core, covered with layers of Carbon Fiber. 

The back of this money clip is a titanium nut that has a screw that holds it in place. The nut can be turned to open the clip and remove it. The clip can be folded to put money into it and folded again to hold money. The front has a small 1.5mm opening that allows it to hold bills and the bills are held by strong carbon fiber "teeth" that grip them in place. 

If you lose this clip, if found by someone, they will not be able to open it and will have to take it to someone who owns one to open it. Or, if you lose it and it is found by someone who also owns one, they will not be able to open it unless they know who it belongs to and can contact you.  

This is a limited 5-year warranty against delamination. Should this item delaminate within 5 years of purchase, Roar Carbon will repair or replace it free of charge.  

Please note that we do not use CFK (Carbon Fiber Knock) on any of our products.

An ideal gift for any book lover, student or educator. Our bookmark is crafted using a process known as repousse. The front of the bookmark is hand crafted using a highly polished, 3-dimensional sterling silver heart, measuring approximately 1 1/8" wide. The repousse process involves "hammering" the metal from the back side to form the intricate heart design.

 [/INST] You're never too old to dream, right? Blink and you'll miss them grow up! If your little one is fast asleep and in a dream world, it's easy to sneak up on them in our Dream PJ's in blue. This simple and comfortable cotton set features short sleeves and a soft blue color so he can always dream about that special place where the wild things are, and peacefully rest while the rest of the world carries on. This adorable set will grow with your child too, as it is made of 100% combed cotton, and it comes in two different sizes. Size small fits up to 8 lbs., while size large is designed for kids up to 12 pounds. These lovely sleeveless PJ's will look great for years to come. Pair it with a matching hat from our own collection of Dream PJ's, or the shoes that go with it. All Spot products are based on the idea of offering our customers the most fantastic fun and practical products possible. We believe that a visit to the beach, the mountains or even a trip to the grocery store can be a whole lot more enjoyable if you have the right clothing. Our clothing is always design-driven, durable and often imbued with a touch of humor. Founded in 2005, Spot is a brand of Martex Group, a leading company in the infant and children's wholesale marketplace. Like our products? Follow us on Facebook!

    Title: Used Cowboy Ropes
Brand: Cowboy Shop
Price: $$12.00

  - Shipping Weight:
                    
5 pounds (View shipping rates and policies)

 [/INST] Where was it? Out at the pens, the barn, the corral, the fence, under the buggy or wagon, around the campfire, up in the timber, or out on the trail. 

How long ago? Last season or the one before, a few months ago, a few weeks ago, or even just a few days ago. 

What was it used for? Catching and restraining an animal for branding, castrating, dehorning, or for shipping. 

How many times was it used? Once or twice, or many times for all the calves and yearlings youve had come through the chute over the years.

This cow rope has earned its leather, and been paid for many times over. Now you can make it earn its keep for you. Many times over.

We've used these ropes for decades and we know their quality and durability. They've endured sun, rain, mud, and who knows what else, to last this long. We have no idea how many times they've been around a herd of wild cattle, and back again, but they show no signs of giving up. 

We cannot guarantee their length, but they are all at least 30 feet long, and most are considerably longer. We cannot guarantee their color, either, as they've seen a lot of sun and exposure, but they are all some shade of brown. None are black.  

These are the real thing. Not those polypropylene ropes you see elsewhere, that are good for one season, or less, and that will never develop that beautiful, soft patina that only genuine leather can achieve. These are the real thing, made of real leather, tanned to withstand the elements and last for decades.  

They may have a few frayed or broken strands, here and there, but these only add to their character and authenticity. You can use them just as they are, or cut them up into smaller pieces for smaller jobs.  

They come in a variety of shapes, too. Some are ropes with a loop on one end, others have knots at one or both ends, and a few have a loop and a knot.  

Buy one, and try it out. If you'

 [/INST] The Schaefer Outfitters Ranger is a true triple-threat: Made in USA, incredibly durable and versatile, it transforms from a lightweight vest to a full-fledged field jacket for all-around outdoor use. Its rugged, water-resistant shell is crafted of 100% polyester, with a 100% nylon bonded quilted flannel lining. An adjustable hook-and-loop storm flap closure with snap tabs secures the front, and large zip pockets offer easy access to gear. Adjustable drawcords at the waist and at the hood provide a custom fit, and rib knit cuffs seal out the elements. The lightweight, insulated Core-3D lining provides lasting warmth in cold weather. Featuring two-way water-resistant zippers and a drawcord-adjustable hood, this versatile, unisex field jacket is convertible to a vest and machine washable.

 [/INST] Here's the product description:

Vests have made a big comeback, and our Stockman is no exception! You'll enjoy the warmth, durability, and versatility that only a Schaefer design can provide. Made with 100% American Wool, it's rugged and substantial with strong wool fibers for warmth, loft, and resilience. The exterior wool is garment-washed for a soft hand, while the interior features Schaefer's signature cordura at the elbows and cuffs, offering even more durability. Fitted with a 3M blend shell taffeta lining and metal stockman snaps, this vest is styled with plaid flannel lining. For added convenience, the right front features quick lock adjustable snap tabs and Schaefer's classic cowhide wrist tab.

Historically, this versatile signature Schaefer design was invented by founder, Alva Schaefer, in the early 1930's. Worn by generations of cattlemen, ranchers, and men who toil outdoors for a living, the stockman has endured for decades because it's strong, warm, practical, and has a rugged charm that's never gone out of style.

 [/INST] 'Lenses Provide Best Optimal Performance for Any Environment - 100% UV Protection - The CliC Adjustable Front Connect Universal Sports Goggle is engineered to provide optimal performance and comfort in any environment. The white or clear Smart Lenses are patented and manufactured by Seal to provide the most comfortable and best vision in any condition. All CliC goggles and sunglasses are manufactured with Seal Technology, which lubricates and moisturizes the SKU for the most comfort while wearing. Smart Lenses allows you to see clearly no matter what the condition. With CliC, you will be able to see better and ride safer. The design of the frame features a full silicone skin gasket and adjustable nose pads, providing you the most comfortable fit possible. Fits up to 100% of all face sizes. The CliC goggle is crafted to provide you with ultimate protection and comfort for the ocean, mountain or any other sports.  
Hinges are made of stainless steel, which is proven to last, even in extreme watersports. The polycarbonate provides durability, impact resistance, and crystal clear vision. Silicone ( Natural Rubber ) provides some of the best grip on the market, without the hinderance of irritating your skin, at a fraction of the cost of plastic frames.  
African Acetate is a beautiful, light, and comfortable material that is crafted for durability and extreme sports. The seal of the frame provides a smooth grip, with anti-slip protection, even in extreme watersports. 

   
A frames fit head sizes up to 800 mm, B frames up to 800 mm, C frames up to 800 mm. 

   
All sizes are in centimeters (cm).
